title: Wednesday Post Show (01-12-22)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (01-12-22)
description:
Bobby talks about his video that blew up on Instagram yesterday because of his toaster. Morgan talks about new Lay’s chips that are made with your favorite NFL team's home field. Bobby shares how a study found that reading books and listening to music doesn’t boost happiness. Bobby also reveals details about his next book coming this year and details for pre-sale. Bobby also gives callers a chance to win some money by rolling the 100-sided die. Amy also updates us on adopting her bird.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
